mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_NAME, CREDIT_CODE, UPDATE_BEFORE_SUPPLIER_INFO, UPDATE_AFTER_SUPPLIER_INFO, UPDATE_REASON, CREATED_AT, SUPPLIER_ID, ORG_NAME, AUDIT_STATUS
mapper.select:
select
from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APPLY_EDIT where 1=1
and SUPPLIER_NAME like '%${supplierName}%'
and AUDIT_STATUS != ${auditStatus}
order by CREATED_AT desc
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APPLY_EDIT (ID, SUPPLIER_NAME, CREDIT_CODE, UPDATE_BEFORE_SUPPLIER_INFO, UPDATE_AFTER_SUPPLIER_INFO, UPDATE_REASON, CREATED_AT, SUPPLIER_ID, ORG_NAME, AUDIT_STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBeforeSupplierInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateAfterSupplierInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APPLY_EDIT
ID,
SUPPLIER_NAME,
CREDIT_CODE,
UPDATE_BEFORE_SUPPLIER_INFO,
UPDATE_AFTER_SUPPLIER_INFO,
UPDATE_REASON,

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APPLY_EDIT
SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_BEFORE_SUPPLIER_INFO = #{updateBeforeSupplierInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_AFTER_SUPPLIER_INFO = #{updateAfterSupplierInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_REASON = #{updateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
